Comments_List: I learned a lot of grammar in Church Slavonic. My ability to read and parse a text also greatly improved.

This course was wonderful. It required a lot of studying, but that is to be expected from a course in a language. The only challenges in this course came in that the language being learned changed between some of the texts we had read. Because of this, the textbooks didn't work for every case and so it can take a bit of time to find information.
I would definitely recommend this course. It is taught well and interesting. Church Slavonic is definitely understudied.
